plugin.name: events_mini
plugin.author: Ruthgul
plugin.description:
.---------------. | events_mini | `---------------'
Miniwindow to keep track of various events.
** REQUIRES **
- The file generic_miniwindow.lua must be placed in the MUSHclient/lua directory. - MUSHclient must have write access to its folder.
Syntax:
* events mini [on|off] - shows/hides the events miniwindow
* reset events - restores the default size
* clear events mini - clears the miniwindow contents
Author: Ruthgul Miniwindow code adapted from Fiendish's / Enelya's chat capture plugins
Latest version: http://github.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts

muclient.script:
require "generic_miniwindow"
----------------- -- plugin stuff -----------------
function OnPluginInstall() Tell("-- " .. GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1) .. ": type ") ColourTell("silver", "black", GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 1) .. " help") Note(" to see info about this plugin --")
show_mini = ((GetVariable("show_mini") or "true") == "true")
if (show_mini) then do_install_miniwindow("events", show_mini, true) end end
function OnPluginEnable() if (show_mini) then mini_show() end end
function OnPluginClose() if (show_mini) then if GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 17) then -- plugin is enabled mini_hide() end end end
function OnPluginDisable() if (show_mini) then mini_hide() end end
function OnPluginSaveState() if (show_mini) then SetVariable("enabled", tostring(GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 17))) save_status() end end
function OnHelp() ColourNote("silver", "black", world.GetPluginInfo(world.GetPluginID(), 3)) Note("") ColourNote("silver", "black", "(this version: " .. os.date("%c", GetPluginInfo(GetPluginID(), 14)) .. ")") end
function plugin_update_url() local t = { "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts/master/src/events_mini.xml", } return (table.concat(t, ";")) end
function plugin_update_aux_url() local t = { "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MateriaMagicaLLC/mm-mushclient-scripts/master/src/generic_miniwindow.lua,MUSH/lua", } return (table.concat(t, ";")) end
---------------------- -- miniwindow toggle ----------------------
function toggle_mini_to(state) if (state == "") then show_mini = not show_mini
elseif (state == "on") then show_mini = true
elseif (state == "off") then show_mini = false end
if (show_mini) then SetVariable("show_mini", "true") mini_show()
else SetVariable("show_mini", "false") mini_hide() end
SaveState() end
---------------------------- -- add stuff to miniwindow ----------------------------
function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) if (id =="6010f6bda5ebf2210998613d") -- affects_by_name and (name == "affects_by_name") and (msg == 1) then process_message(text) end end
function process_message(txt) local t = utils.split(txt, ";")
local who = t[1] local fgcol = t[2] local bgcol = t[3] local subtitle = t[4]
if (string.lower(who) ~= "you") then add_to_mini("silver", "black", who .. ": ") end
add_to_mini(fgcol, bgcol, subtitle) add_to_mini("silver", "black", "\r\n") end
function add_to_mini(fgcol, bgcol, txt) if (show_mini) then if (not styles) then styles = {} end
if (txt == "\r\n") then log_to_mini("", "", "", styles) styles = {}
else styles[#styles + 1] = { text = txt, textcolour = ColourNameToRGB(fgcol), backcolour = ColourNameToRGB(bgcol), length = string.len(txt), style = 0, } end end end
